title: wine_DeLille_2000_Chaleur_Estate_White_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))
text:
Unnamed: 0: 37894.
country: US.
description: In this new vintage there is a bit more Sauvignon Blanc (69%) than usual; the rest is Sémillon. Rich, oaky and expansive, it is an oak and texture-driven style, with the fruit—clean, slightly herbaceous, spicy and tart—playing second fiddle. Which is no criticism, because the delicious, over-the-top flavors, with layer upon layer of creamy complexity, and the rich, buttery finish just beg for lobster in a cream or butter sauce. Who can argue with that? Editors' Choice..
designation: Chaleur Estate.
points: 92.
price: 25.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Columbia Valley (WA).
region_2: Columbia Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
